note:
Poster of random stuff.

Can be found driving commuter trains in the southeast UK, through London and up to Bedford. Follow @traindriver for train-related posts.

Officially a "lord', but only because I bought the rights to a minuscule plot in the castle grounds of a place called "Chaol Ghleann". I don't even know where it is.

Can be very sarcastic. Someone once told me that “sarcasm is the lowest form of wit” so I’m pleased that at least one person finds me funny.

I enjoy travelling, cycling (but only during warmer months) and playing around with Linux on a very basic level. I’ve managed to set up Pi Hole, send pager messages and host a private PBX using a Raspberry Pi. I also run a Pleroma instance on a machine running Ubuntu Server.

All thoughts, comments and opinions are my own. I don’t do politics.

Feel free to follow or interact with any of my posts.

#TrainToot
#nobot
